duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct and organize forming mold repair and machine repair departments to optimize safety, quality, and performance efficiencies at the lowest cost.
Perform administrative activities for effective department management, including employee selection and development, production scheduling, salary administration, budgets, and union relations.
Establish and maintain a safe and healthy environment, ensuring manufacturing of metal containers meets customer specifications and quality standards.
Monitor department performance, report on negative impacts, and develop and implement continuous improvement.
Comply with Environmental and Food Safety standards within department responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate engineering degree in mechanical, electrical, or related discipline. Minimum of ten years experience with manufacturing of metal, with emphasis on forming process and management experience. Non-degreed individuals with equivalent experience will be considered.
